page.title: 19SUBJECTS OF CONCERN IN WYKE
page.content: Several questions about the future of the area have been raised by local people. It is hoped that the countryside will remain as it is and not be further developed either agriculturally or for housing or factory sites. At the same time, unemployment is worrying, but hopefully sufficient infil and redevelopment sites remain to prevent the use of the green areas. Pollution from certain industrial sites is a cause for concern for the health of the local people, particularly for those who live downwind of the prevailing winds. Many old people like living in Wyke, but find the area noisy and wish that more buses were available during the day so that waiting around was cut to a minimum.
